EmailTemplate.name: AA ETS To CIManager Add New Brand
EmailTemplate.subject: Agent App : New competitor brand added
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
{!aa_Agent_Report__c.OwnerFullName} has submitted an Agent report with a new competitor brand - {!aa_Agent_Report__c.OtherBrandName__c} & competitor name - {!aa_Agent_Report__c.OtherCompanyName__c}. Please review the competitor brand/competitor name. If itâ€™s a valid addition please add them to the master list of competitor brand/competitor name & update the Agent report with the new values from the list.
Please use the links below to Approve/Reject the report. Mobile Desktop PS: This is an auto generated mail, please do not reply.
Thanks, The Agent
